_sText:
a map set in a small left town


there are several different places like: bookstore, jail, restaurent, junkyard, etc.

there a small football field with a rollermine that you can shoot into the goals which then teleport back on the field.

every room has switchable lights.

2 secrets. one being a teleportation and another being a fence where one place you can go through

please tell me what you think and make an assesment :D

changes in v2:


added another treehouse of another kind

added lights in the hut next to the jail.

added some pipes a box and a vent duct that leads down to the jail.

fixed some mapping errors. (fx grass going through the floor)

made the windows in the restaurent a bit smaller, made the truck next to it block up more of the windows and added an extra soda machine inside.
